ygData.subject: Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t remember where I read it at (EQVault or Casters Realm), but a couple of weeks ago I saw a message from Brad McQuaid stating that one of the short range
ygData.messageBody:
I can't remember where I read it at (EQVault or Casters Realm), but a couple
of weeks ago I saw a message from Brad McQuaid stating that one of the short
range projects Verant was working on was fixing all the pathing problems in
Mistmoore. Hopefully we will soon see a correction to a bug that has been
in the game since release.

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: silky@... [SMTP:silky@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 1:56 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmore
>
> From: silky@...
>
>
> Pathing in MM is insane, and usually what causes the most problems. Also
> -
> if you see a pet at the zone - DON'T attack it - it is misspawned from the
> other side of the castle wall - and if you do - not only will it's master
> come - but a goodly percentage of the castle with it.
>
> Grouping with someone that knows MM well - and all the buggy path problems
> is by far your best bet - and have them point out all the problems along
> the way.
>
>
>
>
> At 02:49 PM 2/15/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
> >
> >Hi folks,
> >
> >I'm a level 24 bard, soon to be 25. Seeing as how the next few songs are
> >available in kelethin, I figured I'd make mistmore my new home. I was
> >wondering if you had any advice in so far as what areas are appropriate
> for
> >my level and what to watch out for (besides the massive trains)
> >
> >Draelon Stormsong
>
>
>
